body:
- To make sure Sarus' version information is available, the package needs to be installed from a git repository instead of an archive.
- Add a new version of spack
- Add another package maintainer.
- Add a note that sudo/root installation is strongly recommended for production deployment.
- Add an option to enable unit tests only when requested with `--test` in the newest version
title: Sarus: Use commits instead of sha 256 for correct version information
